description: If you are young, arty and consent about conservation why not enter our canvas competition. Your colourful creation could end up on display at DDU center foyer.This canvas competition encourage young people to express their imagination.This  CANVAS PAINTING  will give you opportunity to show your skills
rules: Participants are requested to register before 01/03/2019.
Only one person is allowed for canvas painting.
1 hour  time will be provided for event.
Auction will be held on the day of event and winner will be awarded specific percent share of money from maximum auction amount.
Only one round will be organize for the competition.
Event will be held at central foyer.
